basics.name: NGUYE MINH QUA
basics.summary:
I'm a Data Scientist with IT background and strong in problem-solving. I 
have experience in SQL, data science pipeline, machine learning, deep 
learning, and natural language preprocessing. My favorite programing 
language is Python. 
During my study, I published two research papers about ChatBot and OCR. 
I also join the final round of the Hutech Startup Wings Contest as an AI 
software startup project.
